Expanding the Boundaries of Possibility!

Our Advantages

SRT will elevate your production to a new level of profitability and quality.

  • Flexibility of Use

    Our technologies are applicable in various fields, from electronics and pharmaceuticals to heavy industry. We ensure rapid implementation and customization to your needs while maintaining the highest production quality.

  • Performance

    Our technologies operate around the clock, executing assigned tasks with high precision and stability. They don’t require vacations or days off.

  • Cost-Effectiveness

    Reduce labor costs and training expenses while cutting non-production costs. Increase the volume and quality of manufactured products.

  • Independence from Personnel

    Our technologies ensure production stability, even in the absence or shortage of highly qualified personnel.

Industrial Robotic Arms

We offer a wide range of industrial robotic arms, ensuring their integration into your production process. We provide programming, production of necessary equipment and tooling, and comprehensive technical and software support.

SCARA Robots

Compact design, high speed, high positioning accuracy. Small size and flexibility. Water- and dust-resistant. Lightweight body, Wi-Fi module support, data upload and download, real-time monitoring.

Applications:

Computers, electronics manufacturing, sorting, pharmaceutical production, food industry.

Key Technical Specifications

High protection level, high speed, accuracy, and stability.

Applications:

Computers, communication, consumer electronics, metalworking, food industry, pharmaceutical production. Ideal for intensive operation in confined spaces.

Key Technical Specifications

SRTt Desktop Robots

SRTе Light-to-Medium Load Robots

High speed, repeatability, positioning accuracy, and rigidity. High protection level, lightweight body, low operating and maintenance costs.

Applications:

Computers, communication, consumer electronics manufacturing, metalworking, welding, painting. Primarily used for loading/unloading, grinding/polishing, welding, transferring, and stacking under harsh conditions.

Key Technical Specifications

Rigid structure, high stability, minimal torque fluctuations.

Applications:

Production lines, heavy industry, mechanical engineering, machining, handling heavy loads.

Key Technical Specifications

In-House Manufacturing

Our company is part of "Volga Production Association №3", LLC

It is a stable enterprise equipped with a fleet of modern high-tech machinery, enabling us to produce high-quality products that meet the most stringent customer requirements.We take pride in our professional team, which includes experienced workers, engineers, and programmers. Our specialists efficiently solve complex production challenges and provide services for the creation of tooling and components for automation and robotics projects.

Automation of Technological Processes

Advantages of Automating Technological Processes

  • • Remote process monitoring from any device.
  • • Automatic parameter adjustment, eliminating human error.
  • • Increased productivity and no need for constant operator presence.

A conventional drying cabinet purchased from a domestic manufacturer with manual control proved to be inconvenient and inefficient: setting the modes required constant operator presence, which reduced productivity and profitability.

After our modernization and integration of a processor-based control system, the need for constant personnel presence was eliminated. Human involvement is now limited to loading and unloading, which is required only once every four days.

The system allows remote adjustment of temperature and time settings from any device. Software developed by our engineers enables flexible programming of any modes and cycles, while also providing protection against unforeseen situations. In the event of an emergency, the system will automatically notify you via signal or message.

FOR EXAMPLE: in a process lasting 4 days, the temperature needs to be increased by 7°C every 1.5 hours. Failure to meet these conditions results in spoiled products. Thanks to our automation, the entire process runs seamlessly and fully automatically.

Equipment Modernization

Modernization of Horizontal Boring Machine 2А622Ф4

The customer faced frequent breakdowns of bulky and unreliable Bulgarian-made DC motors on the horizontal boring machine 2А622Ф4.

We designed and manufactured an adapter, bellows coupling components, and other necessary fasteners at our facilities. After testing, the machine was successfully delivered to the customer, who plans to replace all remaining motors similarly!
